TERMS AND CONDITIONS

  1. Delivery must be effected within the time stated, failing which we reserve the right to cancel the order or purchase the goods in the open market and charge the supplier with any loss incurred as a result.
  2. The company shall have the option to cancel the whole order or to reject the goods in case of short deliveries. Part delivery will be accepted only at our discretion.
  3. Materials not packed properly and labelled clearly as follows will be rejected:
    • Name of the items as per our purchase order.
    • Quantity
    • Challan No.
    • Supplier's Name
  4. Invoices should be submitted in Triplicate together with a copy of lorry receipt & Excise duty gate pass.
  5. The prices indicated in the order shall hold good till its complete execution. The company will not allow an increase in the prices during the period of the contract.
  6. Goods not conforming to our specifications/standards and as per supply samples are liable to be rejected at the supplier's expense.
  7. Other rejected material shall be collected at your cost immediately after the intimation of the rejection to you.
